titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Madame C. J. Walker should be recognized for her achievements in business, her inventions, and her commitment to the African-American community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 2/6/2007--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Madame C. J. Walker should be recognized as one of history's greatest businesswomen and role models for the Nation's young people.
